title: This ‘Rocky Horror Picture Show’ Deluxe Vinyl Features Never-Before-Seen Photos and Diary Excerpts From Composer Richard Hartley
summary: “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” is getting the golden treatment. To celebrate the cult classic’s 50th anniversary, Ode Records has reissued the original movie soundtrack as a deluxe edition 180g red-in-gold vinyl, housed in a heavyweight gold-foil jacket. The collector’s release includes a newly de…
